item.title: How I created my first Course with Datacamp
item.description:
I just published an online course! covering advanced Microsoft Fabric topics like security, deployment, admin settings, and version control!

Honestly, I never imagined I’d say, “I’m a teacher”… It feels pretty wild, but here I am!

This project kept me busy for months, and I’m really proud of how it turned out. Fabric is way more complex than Power BI. It’s a complete data platform with several services, and there’s not much in-depth content out there for those who want to learn about the technical side. With my experience in a large organization, where I learned about Power BI and Fabric firsthand, I was excited to share what I know.
